item.title: Price and spec of cloud based GPU
item.description: I summarized several cloud based GPU services: Name of services Specification Price (US$) AWS P2 instance p2.xLarge 0.9 / hour Azure NC6 1xK80 0.9 / hour Lambda GPU cloud 8x AWS P2 instances 0.90 / GPU/ hour NTU HPCC 2 units of 1-P100 is scheduled to be ready by End of October, 2 Units of 8-V100 is scheduled to be ready by End of December 0.
